summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating portions of South Jackson Street, Fourth Avenue South, and Airport Way South on the petition of Union Pacific Realty, predecessor in interest to Union Pacific Railroad Company (Clerk File Nos. 295980, 295981, and 295982); authorizing the Mayor to execute a Quit Claim Deed for the vacated rights of way; accepting and approving utility easements; and accepting and approving a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith.
